alert.note: Alert for Crittenden (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 28 at 12:09PM CDT until April 05 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee...Mississippi...Arkansas...Missouri... Mississippi River at Memphis Mississippi River at Caruthersville Mississippi River Above Tiptonville Mississippi River at Osceola Mississippi River at Tunica Mhoon Landing For the Lower Mississippi River...including Tiptonville, Caruthersville, Osceola, Memphis, Tunica Mhoon Landing, Helena... elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY, APRIL 05... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Memphis. * WHEN...Until Wednesday, April 05. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, In Arkansas, Dacus Lake Road under the I-55 Bridge begins to flood. Water is encroaching on the levee south of Blue Lake. The road to Island 40 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.4 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Action stage is 28.0 feet. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
